title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8101.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8101.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 5. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 5 between IR 87 and the Albany city
line in the Town of Colonie and Village of Colonie. (b) Wolf Road. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Wolf Road between Route 5 and the junction of Route 155 in the

Village of Colonie and the Town of Colonie. (c) Route 910D (Washington Avenue Extension). The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 910D (Washington Avenue

Extension) between Route 155 (New Karner Road) and Fuller Road in the City of

Albany and the Town of Guilderland. (d) Old Karner Road. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Old Karner Road between Albany Street and Route 5 in the

Village of Colonie and the Town of Colonie. (e) US Route 9W. The northbound and
southbound roadways of US Route 9W between the Greene/Albany county line and

Exit 23 of the Thruway/IR 787 intersection in the Towns of Bethlehem and

Coeymans and the City of Albany. (f) Fuller Road. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Fuller Road between the southerly Town of

Guilderland/City of Albany line and Warehouse Road in the Towns of Colonie and

Guilderland and the City of Albany. (g) Route 155 (New Karner Road). The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 155 (New Karner Road) between

Apollo Drive and US Route 20 in the Town of Colonie, City of Albany and Town of

Guilderland. (h) Charles Park Road. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Charles Park Road between Route 155 and

Kane Carpet Company terminal in the City of Albany and the Town of

Guilderland. (i) Eff. until Aug. 29, 1990, see also subd. (i) below.] Route 32. Route 32 from the northerly IR
787 exit ramp on South Pearl Street in the City of Albany to West Yard Road in
the Town of Bethlehem. (i) [Eff. Aug. 29, 1990, see also subd. (i) above.] Route 32. Route 32 between the IR 787
exit ramp to South Pearl Street and the Albany County/Greene county line, in
the City of Albany and the Towns of Bethlehem, New Scotland, Coeymans and

Westerlo. (j) Route 143. Route 143
between Route US 9W in the Village of Ravena and Route 144 in the Town of

Coeymans. (k) Curry Road. Curry

Road between Morris Road/Curry Road Extension intersection and I-890
entrance/exit ramps. (l) Route 2. Route 2 between I-87 and Route 32 in the Town of Colonie and the City of

Watervliet. (n) Route 32. Route 32
(2nd Avenue, Cohoes Road and Saratoga Street) between Route 2 and Dyke

Avenue. (o) IR 787. IR 787 (the

Cohoes Arterial) between the northern terminus of Route 914H at the former Arch

Street Crossing and Route 32. (p) Route 396. Route 396 between US Route 9W and the westerly terminus of Route 396
in the Towns of Bethlehem and Coeymans. (q) CR 301 (Monkey Run Road/Cedar Grove

Road/Tarrytown Road). CR 301 (Monkey Run Road/Cedar Grove Road/Tarrytown Road)
between the westerly terminus of Route 396 and Route 443 in the Towns of

Coeymans and New Scotland. (r) Route 443. Route 443 between CR 302 (Monkey Run Road/Cedar Grove Road/Tarrytown

Road) and the Albany County/Schoharie county line in the Towns of New Scotland, Berne and Knox. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8101.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
